questions.question: HOW DO I INSTALL MY SUBSCRIPTION?
questions.answer: After payment for your subscription, a WhatsApp message or confirmation email with your access information and activation instructions will be sent to you.

questions.question: IS IT COMPATIBLE WITH MY DEVICE?
questions.answer: Our streaming service is accessible on all devices.

questions.question: HOW MANY DEVICES CAN I USE?
questions.answer: Subscribers to our service can use 1 device at a time.

questions.question: DO YOU OFFER A FREE TRIAL?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 1-day free trial on all our plans. You can test all features before your subscription begins. No charges will be made before the trial period ends.

questions.question: HOW DO I ACTIVATE MY SUBSCRIPTION?
questions.answer: Once payment is confirmed, a WhatsApp message or email will be sent within the hour.

questions.question: HOW CAN I GET ANSWERS TO MY QUESTIONS?
questions.answer: Please contact us via WhatsApp or email: support@flynix.com
